workflow.name: Automate invoice generation & email delivery with Jotform, Xero & GPT-4o-mini
workflow.description:
## Generate Invoices for Customers with Jotform, Xero and Slack
This workflow automates the entire process of receiving a product/service order, checking or creating a customer in **Xero**, generating an invoice, emailing it, and notifying the sales team for example (via **Slack**)  ‚Äî all triggered by a form submission (via **Jotform**).

## How It Works
1. **Receive Submission**
* Triggered when a user submits a form.
* Collects data like customer details, selected product/service, etc.

2. **Check If Customer Exists**
* Searches Xero to determine if the customer already exists.
* ‚úÖ **If Customer Exists:** **Update** customer details.
* ‚ùå **If Customer Doesn‚Äôt Exist:** **Create** a new customer in Xero.

3. **Create The Invoice**
* Generates a new invoice for the customer using the item selected.

4. **Send The Invoice**
* Automatically sends the invoice via email to the customer.

5. **Notify The Team**
* Notifies the sales team for example via Slack about the new invoice.

## Who Can Benefit from This Workflow?
* **Freelancers**
* **Service Providers**
* **Consultants & Coaches**
* **Small Businesses**
* **E-commerce or Custom Product Sellers**

## Requirements
- Jotform webhook setup, more info [here](https://www.jotform.com/help/245-how-to-setup-a-webhook-with-jotform/)
- Xero credentials, more info [here](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/credentials/xero)
- Make sure that products/services values in Jotform are exactly the same as your item `Code` in your Xero account
- Email setup, update email node (`Send email`)
- LLM model credentials
- Slack credentials, more info [here](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/credentials/slack)

workflow.name: Generate Invoices for Customers with Jotform, Xero and Slack

parameters.content:
## Receive Submission
Receives the product/service form submission from Jotform

## Create Contact
Creates a new contact

## Create The Invoice
Creates a new invoice for that contact

## Generate Invoices for Customers with Jotform, Xero and Slack
This workflow automates the entire process of receiving a product/service order, checking or creating a customer in **Xero**, generating an invoice, emailing it, and notifying the sales team for example (via **Slack**)  ‚Äî all triggered by a form submission (via **Jotform**).

## How It Works
### 1- Receive Submission
* Triggered when a user submits a form.
* Collects data like customer details, selected product/service, etc.

### 2- Check If Customer Exists
* Searches Xero to determine if the customer already exists.
* ‚úÖ **If Customer Exists:** **Update** customer details.
* ‚ùå **If Customer Doesn‚Äôt Exist:** **Create** a new customer in Xero.

### 3- Create The Invoice
* Generates a new invoice for the customer using the item selected.

### 4- Send The Invoice
* Automatically sends the invoice via email to the customer.

### 5- Notify The Team
* Notifies the sales team for example via Slack about the new invoice.

## Who Can Benefit from This Workflow?
* **Freelancers**
* **Service Providers**
* **Consultants & Coaches**
* **Small Businesses**
* **E-commerce or Custom Product Sellers**

## Requirements
- Jotform webhook setup, more info [here](https://www.jotform.com/help/245-how-to-setup-a-webhook-with-jotform/)
- Xero credentials, more info [here](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/credentials/xero)
- Make sure that products/services values in Jotform are exactly the same as your item `Code` in your Xero account
- Email setup, update email node (`Send email`)
- LLM model credentials
- Slack credentials, more info [here](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/credentials/slack)

## Format Data
Formats the data thus making it easier to be used in other nodes

options.systemMessage: =You are an AI assistant that generates a professional invoice email that you get from an Xero response (newly created invoice), so you will recive an Xero invoice response and thus your job is to create a professional html email content because this html email content will be sent to the customer.

parameters.content:
## Send The Invoice
Sends the newly created invoice for that customer(via email)

## Check If Contact exists 
Checks if the contact exists in Xero or not

## Notify The Team
Notifies the team (sales team for example) about the new invoice

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
